attributes.action: ask North Lincolnshire Council to overturn its decison to approve the planning application in respect of the Tranquilty funeral parlour, Scunthorpe, until such time as the Local Government Ombudsman has assessed the petitioners' case and adjudicated on it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Residents living in close proximity to the proposed Tranquility funeral parlour in Scunthorpe, North Lincolnshire, along with other persons having legitimate objections to the application, made their views known to a planning committee of the North Lincolnshire Council. It is their opinion that the process culminating in approval being given to the application was fundamentally flawed, and that the decision to approve the application should therefore be overturned. In summary, it is the process by which the approval was given that they challenge, not the decision per se.
